issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchen Sink
2. Rotate device to landscape left
3. Run Base UI > Window (Standalone)

Actual:
The test is launched upside down

Expected:
Test should launch and display correctly
fields.summary: Android 3.0 xoom: Landscape left  causes windows standalone to launch upside down, some test case will self rotate

comments.body: this is resolved with #4504.  The previous behavior ended up with the portrait mode being set and on the xoom, the portrait mode is actually reverse of what we would normally consider portrait.  You can still reproduce the behavior reported by locking the orientation to portrait.
